LSTM-CRF model outperforms all other sys.from sentence: Our LSTM-CRF model outperforms all other systems, including the ones using external labeled data like gazetteers.

Stack-LSTM model also outperforms all pr.from sentence: Our Stack-LSTM model also outperforms all previous models that do not incorporate external features, apart from the one presented by Chiu and Nichols (2015).

outperforms.from sentence: Tables 2, 3 and 4 present our results on NER for German, Dutch and Spanish respectively in comparison to other models. On these three languages, the LSTM-CRF model significantly outperforms all previous methods, including the ones using external labeled data. The only exception is Dutch, where the model of Gillick et al. (2015) can perform better by leveraging the information from other NER datasets.
